page.title: 15FAVOURITE THINGS
page.content: {FAVOURITE THINGS One of my favourite things is the Roller Coaster at Scarborough.When you get into the car you start to feel as if someone is sticking a sword into your stomach. It sets off and you go round a corner and up a steep hill. When you get to the top you go round a corner, straight down the hill and up, round and down again and so on until you get to the end. My favourite playground game is chain tig. For this game one person is on and if he or she touches you,you have to hold hands and if you or your partner tigs or touches any one that person would be on as well.When there are four people on you split up into pairs.Then there is a den this is a rest place where the people who are on can't get you.You chase until every one is caught,then a new game starts.
